Sentencas: We investigated the long-term performance degradation in a solid oxide carbon fuel cell (SO-CFC) integrated with a steam gasifier that used activated carbon as a fuel.
Titulo: Long-term performance degradation study of solid oxide carbon fuel cells integrated with a steam gasifier

Sentencas: The steam gasifier-integrated SO-CFC was continuously operated for 2000 h at 750 degrees C under galvanostatic conditions.
Titulo: Long-term performance degradation study of solid oxide carbon fuel cells integrated with a steam gasifier

Sentencas: Fuel analysis, in-situ electrochemical tests, and post-mortem characterization were performed to determine the dominant degradation factors during the extended operation of the SO-CFC.
Titulo: Long-term performance degradation study of solid oxide carbon fuel cells integrated with a steam gasifier

Sentencas: During the 2000 h continuous operation, the overall degradation rate of the SO-CFC was 0.108 V per 1000 h. Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy analysis showed that the polarization and ohmic resistance of the SO-CFC increased gradually with the operation time.
Titulo: Long-term performance degradation study of solid oxide carbon fuel cells integrated with a steam gasifier

Sentencas: The post-mortem diagnosis via SEM, XRD, EDS, and XPS analyses revealed that the increased Ni particle coarsening and carbon deposition at the anode functional layer induced increased performance degradation in the SO-CFC.
Titulo: Long-term performance degradation study of solid oxide carbon fuel cells integrated with a steam gasifier

Sentencas: The long-term durability study of the SO-CFC with a steam gasifier confirmed that conventional anode materials result in rapid performance degradation during 2000 h continuous operation, and further development of anode materials will be necessary for the long and durable operation of SO-CFCs.
Titulo: Long-term performance degradation study of solid oxide carbon fuel cells integrated with a steam gasifier
